OgrePagingLandScapeOcclusionSorter.h

00001 #ifndef _PagingLandScapeOcclusionSorterH
00002 #define _PagingLandScapeOcclusionSorterH
00003 
00004 #include "OgrePagingLandScapePrerequisites.h"
00005 #include "OgrePagingLandScapeOcclusionElement.h"
00006 
00007 namespace Ogre
00008 {
00009    
00010     //comparator for priority queue
00011     class FrontToBackNodeSorterOperator 
00012     {
00013 
00014             public:
00015                         FrontToBackNodeSorterOperator(const Vector3& position) :   pos(position) {};
00016                         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00017                     inline bool operator()(OcclusionElement*& a, OcclusionElement*& b) const 
00018             {
00019                 // could check if both distance == 0 then order visible first// ?
00020                         return vectorToBoxDistance (*a, pos) > vectorToBoxDistance (*b, pos);
00021                         }       
00022                         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00023                         inline bool operator()(const OcclusionElement*& a, const OcclusionElement*& b) const 
00024                         {
00025                                 // could check if both distance == 0 then order visible first ?
00026                                 return vectorToBoxDistance (*a, pos) > vectorToBoxDistance (*b, pos);
00027                         }       
00028                         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029             Real vectorToBoxDistance(const OcclusionElement &a, const Vector3& point)  const
00030                 {
00031                 const Vector3 &boxMin = a.getCullBoundingBox ().getMinimum ();
00032                 const Vector3 halfSize ((a.getCullBoundingBox ().getMaximum () - boxMin) * 0.5);
00033                 // work in the box's coordinate system
00034                 const Vector3 kDiff (point - (halfSize + boxMin));
00035                 // compute squared distance and closest point on box
00036                 Real fSqrDistance (0.0);
00037                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00038                 {
00039                     const Real kClosest = kDiff[i];
00040                     const Real khalfSize = halfSize[i];
00041                     if (kClosest < -khalfSize)
00042                     {
00043                         const Real fDelta = kClosest + khalfSize;
00044                         fSqrDistance += fDelta * fDelta;
00045                     }
00046                     else if (kClosest > khalfSize)
00047                     {
00048                         const Real fDelta = kClosest - khalfSize;
00049                         fSqrDistance += fDelta * fDelta;
00050                     }
00051                 }
00052                 return fSqrDistance;
00053             }
00054 
00055         private:
00056                     const Vector3 pos;
00057     };
00058 }//namespace Ogre
00059 
00060 #endif //_PagingLandScapeOcclusionSorterH
